dakShi#NAqdOta saqvyAt |
viShNOqrnuka#M ~MvIqryA#Niq pra vO#caqM ~MyaH pArthi#vAni vimaqmE rajA(gm)#siq yO aska#BAyaqdutta#ra(gm) saqdhastha#M ~MvicakramAqNa strEqdhOru#gAqyO viShNO# raqrATa#masiq viShNO$H pRuqShThama#siq viShNOqH SnaptrE$ sthOq viShNOqH syUra#siq viShNO$ rdhruqvama#si vaiShNaqvama#siq viShNa#vE tvA || 27
(aqsyaq-yaqcCai-kAqnna ca#tvAriq(gm)qSacca#) (A13)
